channel.title: Release Notes - 2018 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2018 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.PDF for CPP 18.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.12 Improvements and Changes New version of Aspose.PDF for C++ has codebase of Aspose.PDF for .Net 18.12 API Reference changes in Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.12 New Aspose.Pdf.Engine.Presentation.Graphics namespace is introduced. Full API reference is available on https://reference.aspose.com/pdf/cpp

item.title: Aspose.PDF for CPP 18.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.11 Improvements and Changes New version of Aspose.PDF for C++ has codebase of Aspose.PDF for .Net 18.11 API Reference changes in Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.11 Namespace hierarchy has been simplified and improved. Therefore new version is incompatible with Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.4.

item.title: Aspose.PDF for CPP 18.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.4 Improvements and Changes Internal code improved: fixed some bugs and improved performance. Improved AsposeCppLib: System.Xml, System.Drawing classes. API Reference changes in Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.4 The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.PDF for C++.

item.title: Aspose.PDF for CPP 18.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.3 Improvements and Changes In this release new pointer system SmartPtr is introduced instead of SharedPtr and WeakPtr. SharedPtr is alias for SmartPtr. WeakPtr is inherited from SmartPtr. Fixed asposecpplib to improve performance. Public API Changes in Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.3 The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.PDF for CPP 18.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for C++ 18.2 Improvements and Changes Internal changes: In this release char16_t is used instead of wchar_t to improve performance and interaction with ICU library. Fixed issue with wrong initialization in Annotations.

item.title: Aspose.PDF for CPP 18.1 Release Notes
item.description: Improvements and Changes Internal changes: \1. System::Security::Cryptography namespace is extended with following classes: RC2 TripleDES RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter \2. Performance improved
